title.rendered: The highly commended Upcoming FM Company

content.rendered: TTE Facilities Management received the Highly Commended Award for ‘Upcoming FM Company of the Year’ at Facilities Management Middle East Awards 2024. Dilip Sharma- Executive Vice President, Marc Daly- Vice President, Kanchan Koppikar- Senior Manager- Marketing & Communications, Nishanth Krishnamoorthy- Head of Operations and Mohammed Shameer- Sales & Estimation Manager represented TTE FM at the awards. This industry recognition is a testament to the company’s guarantee of providing highly technical and quality services in the Hard & Soft Services landscape. TTE FM strives to achieve operational excellence and deliver superior engineering-led facilities management services.
